name: Talentropy.ai
headline: AI solution that streamlines candidate screening and recruitment
description:
Think of us as your dedicated AI recruiting team, available 24/7 to engage with every single candidate in their preferred language. We help companies to evaluate 100% of their candidates while reducing the workload on their recruiting teams. 

Our technical co-founders, Rubén, Vladimir, and Sebastián, bring vast HR industry experience. HoyTrabajas is supported by Rebel Fund, Alan Rutledge, Kube Ventures, Flucas VC, Magic Fund, New Ventures, Y Combinator (w22), and more.

founders.name: Ruben Cordoba, Founder
founders.description:
MBA, I have more than 10 years of experience in entrepreneurship. I worked in planning and fundraising for infrastructure projects. 
I have 3 years of experience in the recruiting & staffing industry. 
I´m passionate about companies, art, and activities that involve risk. I consider myself good at solving problems and motivating his team.

founders.name: Sebastian Arce, Founder
founders.description:
Sebastian Arce Rubio - Co-Founder & Strategy Director
Industrial Engineer with technological Background focused on mathematical models and project management. He is passionate about working and influencing other people's lives with his work. It is considered very strong in B2B sales.

founders.name: Vladimir Guzman, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder and CTO. I have been involved with entrepreneurship for more than 10 years of my professional life, although my background is technical, I'm more passionate about the business line as such, which has led me to work as Product Manager and CTO in the companies in which I have taken part. Co-founder of several digital businesses, responsible for technological guidance with market needs. Connoisseur of agile methodologies such as SCRUM.

![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Zephyr-Hero-Icon_blue2.webp)
###### AI-POWERED AUTOMATION
##  Quickly find the workers you need to keep your operations running, while reducing costs and time-to-hire.
Talentropy.ai is designed for companies hiring operational and low-skilled workers efficiently and at scale.
[ Request a Demo today ](https://talentropy.ai/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjE2MSIsInRvZ2dsZSI6ZmFsc2V9>)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/TL5.jpeg)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/TL1.jpeg)
## Talentropy revolutionizes candidate communication, delivering exceptional talent through a blend of conversational AI and memorable experiences.
While your competition struggles with traditional processes, you offer an experience that reflects your company’s innovation and connects with the talent you truly want on your team. More than recruiting, we build bridges between extraordinary talent and visionary companies.
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Zephyr-Connect-Image-1.webp)
## 10%
Savings in recruitment processes
## +0%
Feedback candidates
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Zephyr-Connect-Image-2.webp)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Zephyr-Connect-Image-3.webp)
## 0K+
Conversations
## Transform Your Recruitment with the Power of Conversational AI
Talentropy revolutionizes the way companies engage and evaluate talent. Our AI-powered platform remove repetitive manual tasks, automates candidate assessment, and provides a seamless recruitment experience for both your team and applicants. Gain more time for what really matters: connecting with the best candidates.
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/TALENT7.jpeg)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Zephyr-Tools-Image-2.webp)
  * Complete and standardized resumes 


When candidates upload their resumes, our AI automatically generates a complete and standardized profile, highlighting key skills. This saves your recruitment team time, simplifies profile comparison, and speeds up the selection process.
  * Automatic and Intelligent Evaluation 


Forget about manually reviewing resumes. Our AI analyzes and instantly rates the affinity of each candidate with your vacancies, prioritizing the most qualified and saving you hours of filtering.
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/TL6.jpeg)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/TL1-1024x572.jpeg)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/TL6.jpeg)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/TALENT8-768x788.jpeg)
  * Frictionless Experience 


Create job posting using natural language and let our AI optimize them. No complex forms, no tedious processes—just smooth conversations that enhance the experience for everyone involved.
  * Processes up to 3 Times Faster 


Drastically reduce your hiring times with instant job posting, automatic evaluation, and an intuitive dashboard that allows you to make quicker decisions.
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/dash_3-scaled.webp)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/dash_2_2-scaled.webp)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/dash1-scaled.webp)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/funnel.webp)
  * Data-Driven Decisions 


Access key real-time metrics on your selection processes, conversion rates, and the performance of your job posting to continuously optimize your recruitment strategy.
##  Maximize Your Reach - One Link, All Channels
Share your vacancies without limits. With a single link, engage all candidates coming through social media, job boards, referrals, or any of your acquisition channels. Simple, easy, and effective.
[ Contact me ](https://talentropy.ai/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjE2MSIsInRvZ2dsZSI6ZmFsc2V9>)
![](https://talentropy.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/TALENTROPY-Integrations-redes-939x1024.webp)
###### Better Talent
## Engage candidates with an incredible application experience and find the best talent.
In a competitive market, the candidate experience makes all the difference. Talentropy allows you to offer a modern and seamless application process that reflects your company’s innovation. While candidates enjoy a smooth chat-like experience, you build a stronger employer brand and attract the talent you truly want.
####  Increase the Quality of Your Applicants 
A simple and professional process attracts better talent. Our conversational interface eliminates application abandonment and ensures that the best candidates complete the process, increasing your pool of qualified talent.
####  Strengthen Your Employer Brand 
Stand out as an innovative company. Offer a modern application experience that shows your commitment to technology and candidate experience, improving your brand’s perception in the job market.
####  Reduce Hiring Times 
The seamless experience accelerates the entire process. From application to interview scheduling, every step is faster and more efficient, allowing you to close hires before your competition.
####  Improve Conversion Rates 
A frictionless process means more completed applications. Our conversational platform reduces abandonment by up to 60%, ensuring that more qualified candidates reach the final stages of the process.
## Affordable Pricing Plans
Choose the perfect fit for your support needs with Outgrid’s flexible pricing plans. 
### Entry

/ year

  * Unlimited job post
  * Up to 100 chat / month

  * Standard support

  * Unlimited job post
  * Up to 5K chat / month
  * 10 user
  * 24/7 Dedicated KAM


[ Contact me ](https://talentropy.ai/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjE2MSIsInRvZ2dsZSI6ZmFsc2V9>)
## Frequently Asked Questions
Explore answers to commonly asked questions in Talentropy’s FAQ section.
#####  How does Talentropy.ai help create job listings? 
Talentropy.ai allows you to describe the position in natural language, and the system automatically generates a complete job listing with all necessary fields.
#####  Can I edit the job listing after it’s created? 
Yes, you can make adjustments at any time. The system will also prompt you with questions if any key information is missing.
#####  How do I share job listings with candidates? 
After creating a job listing, a unique link is generated that you can share on any platform. You can also add UTM parameters to track the performance of the job post.
#####  What information does the system collect about candidates? 
Talentropy.ai collects resumes, responses to filter questions, and a compatibility score for each candidate, helping you prioritize applicants.
#####  Does the system allow scheduling interviews? 
Yes, candidates who meet the minimum requirements can schedule interviews automatically through the platform.
#####  How does the candidate scoring system work? 
The system analyzes the resume and responses to filter questions to generate a compatibility score, helping you rank the most suitable candidates.
#####  Can I compare candidates in the system? 
Yes, Talentropy.ai allows you to compare multiple candidates side by side to facilitate decision-making.
#####  What kind of reports does the platform generate? 
You can access reports on job post views, candidate sources, and the performance of your recruitment campaigns.
##  Be the First to Experience the Future of Hiring!
Unlock early access to **Talentropy.ai** and revolutionize the way you find and hire top talent. Join now and be among the first to streamline your recruitment process with AI-powered job matching. Don’t miss out—sign up today and stay ahead in the race for the best candidates!
[ Request a Demo Now ](https://talentropy.ai/<#elementor-action%3Aaction%3Dpopup%3Aopen%26settings%3DeyJpZCI6IjE2MSIsInRvZ2dsZSI6ZmFsc2V9>)

####  Increase the Quality of Your Applicants 
A simple and professional process attracts better talent. Our conversational interface eliminates application abandonment and ensures that the best candidates complete the process, increasing your pool of qualified talent.
####  Strengthen Your Employer Brand 
Stand out as an innovative company. Offer a modern application experience that shows your commitment to technology and candidate experience, improving your brand’s perception in the job market.
####  Reduce Hiring Times 
The seamless experience accelerates the entire process. From application to interview scheduling, every step is faster and more efficient, allowing you to close hires before your competition.
####  Improve Conversion Rates 
A frictionless process means more completed applications. Our conversational platform reduces abandonment by up to 60%, ensuring that more qualified candidates reach the final stages of the process.

## Frequently Asked Questions
Explore answers to commonly asked questions in Talentropy’s FAQ section.
#####  How does Talentropy.ai help create job listings? 
Talentropy.ai allows you to describe the position in natural language, and the system automatically generates a complete job listing with all necessary fields.
#####  Can I edit the job listing after it’s created? 
Yes, you can make adjustments at any time. The system will also prompt you with questions if any key information is missing.
#####  How do I share job listings with candidates? 
After creating a job listing, a unique link is generated that you can share on any platform. You can also add UTM parameters to track the performance of the job post.
#####  What information does the system collect about candidates? 
Talentropy.ai collects resumes, responses to filter questions, and a compatibility score for each candidate, helping you prioritize applicants.
#####  Does the system allow scheduling interviews? 
Yes, candidates who meet the minimum requirements can schedule interviews automatically through the platform.
#####  How does the candidate scoring system work? 
The system analyzes the resume and responses to filter questions to generate a compatibility score, helping you rank the most suitable candidates.
#####  Can I compare candidates in the system? 
Yes, Talentropy.ai allows you to compare multiple candidates side by side to facilitate decision-making.
#####  What kind of reports does the platform generate? 
You can access reports on job post views, candidate sources, and the performance of your recruitment campaigns.

generated_description:
### Talentropy.ai: Revolutionizing Recruitment with AI

**Overview**
Founded in 2019 and based in Bogotá, Colombia, Talentropy.ai is transforming how companies approach recruitment by leveraging artificial intelligence. Positioned within the Y Combinator W22 batch, this innovative startup aims to simplify the candidate screening process and enhance recruitment efficiency.

**Mission**
Talentropy.ai has one clear mission: to serve as a dedicated AI recruiting team that operates around the clock. By ensuring that every candidate is engaged in their preferred language, Talentropy enables businesses not only to evaluate 100% of their applicants but also to significantly reduce the burden on human recruiters. 

**The Team**
The co-founding trio of Rubén, Vladimir, and Sebastián bring extensive knowledge from the HR industry, equipping Talentropy with the insights necessary to tackle recruitment challenges. Supporting these efforts are notable investors like Rebel Fund, Alan Rutledge, Kube Ventures, Flucas VC, Magic Fund, New Ventures, and, of course, Y Combinator.

**What They Offer**
Talentropy.ai has developed an AI-powered platform that automates candidate evaluation and streamlines hiring processes. Here’s what sets it apart:

1. **Conversational AI**:  Their system transforms candidate communication into engaging, natural interactions, thus improving the overall candidate experience.
   
2. **Automation of Manual Tasks**: Automating resume evaluations and candidate assessments frees up recruiters to focus on building relationships with top candidates.

3. **Data-Driven Insights**: Users gain access to real-time metrics, enabling better decision-making regarding recruitment strategies.

4. **Frictionless Experience**: Job postings can be generated through natural language, optimizing efficiency without tedious forms or processes.

5. **Faster Hiring Processes**: Companies can process applicants up to three times more quickly, ensuring they secure talent before competitors do.

**Key Features**
- **Standardized Resumes**: Resumes are converted into uniform profiles, simplifying comparison.
- **Automatic Evaluation**: Candidates are rated based on their alignment with job vacancies, prioritizing top talent effortlessly.
- **Multi-Channel Job Sharing**: A single link allows for easy sharing across various platforms, maximizing candidate reach.

**Pricing Plans**
Talentropy.ai offers a range of flexible pricing options:
- **Entry**: $2.1K/year for basic features.
- **Starter**: $8.1K/year with expanded capabilities.
- **Pro**: $20K/year for advanced needs.
- **Enterprise**: $58K/year for larger organizations requiring dedicated support.

**The Bottom Line**
At its core, Talentropy is about more than just filling positions—it's about creating meaningful connections between groundbreaking companies and exceptional talent. In a world where talent acquisition is increasingly competitive, they stand out by offering a refreshing and efficient approach to recruitment through the power of AI.

**Want to Learn More?**
To dive deeper into what Talentropy.ai offers or to get a demo, visit [Talentropy.ai](https://talentropy.ai/) and see how they're redefining the recruitment landscape.
